title: Gamification-Based Job-Related Language Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic professional language proficiency relevant to job-related contexts
context.additional_context: Language education course applying gamification techniques in simulation and VR environments for professionals in healthcare, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners improve job-related language proficiency by 30% through gamification elements
Learners acquire at least three communication strategies required for practical tasks by performing role-specific scenarios in simulation/VR environments
Learners reduce language usage errors by 50% through a gamified feedback system
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
